description.en: A tough Selkie male who cozies up to tribes he dislikes for his own purposes. Far from subservient、 though、 he carries conviction and works lightheartedly for the sake of his dream. He and Layle recognize each other's abilities and rely on the other while on their numerous jobs together.
description.jp:
「我」の民族セルキー族の男性。嫌いな
種族の人間でも取り入り利用するなど
性格はしたたかだが 決して卑屈になる
ことはなく 自身の夢のため信念を持ち
快活に行動する。レイルとは互いの
能力を認め 信頼しあう相棒で 数々の
仕事をともにこなしてきた。

desc.en: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Ranged attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 遠距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
2-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack
Grants [Selkie Spirit] for 3 turns

[Selkie Spirit] raises party Max BRV, Attack and Critical Hit Rate
desc.gl: 2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack\nSelf: 3 turns Selkie Soul
desc.jp: 2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃\n自身に3ACTION「セルキー魂」付与

desc.gl: Selkie Soul: Raises party's MAX BRV, ATK, critical hit rate (does not stack)
desc.jp: セルキー魂：味方全員の最大BRV 攻撃力 クリティカル率が上昇する（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

desc.en:
3-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack
Raises party BRV based on HP damage dealt
Grants [Smash Support] to selected ally for 1 turn
Extends duration of [Selkie Spirit] by 1 turn
Moves own next turn to right after selected ally's turn

[Smash Support] triggers the following effect:
• When attack hits, initiate Chase Sequence on target 
• Prevents BREAK and leaves BRV at 1
※Cannot be extended
desc.gl:
3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt
Selected ally: 1 turn Smash Support
Extends active Selkie Soul duration 1 turn
Moves next turn to after selected ally
No Knock Back
desc.jp:
3HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRVを味方全員に加算
指定した味方単体に1ACTION「スマッシュサポート」付与
自身に付与されている「セルキー魂」を1ACTION延長
次回行動順が指定した味方の直後に移動
この攻撃では吹きとばしは発生しない

desc.gl:
6-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt
Selected ally: 1 turn Smash Support
Extends active Selkie Soul duration 1 turn
Moves next turn to after selected ally
No Knock Back
desc.jp:
6HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRVを味方全員に加算
指定した味方単体に1ACTION「スマッシュサポート」付与
自身に付与されている「セルキー魂」を1ACTION延長
次回行動順が指定した味方の直後に移動
この攻撃では吹きとばしは発生しない

desc.en:
6-HIT AoE ranged BRV + HP attack
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
Grants [Meticulous Preparation] for 3 turns

[Meticulous Preparation] has the following effects:
• Raises party HP Damage Dealt during Chase
• Lowers all enemies' Speed
desc.gl:
6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns At the Ready
desc.jp:
6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に3ACTION「用意周到」付与

desc.gl: At the Ready: Raises party's HP damage dealt in chain attacks; lowers all enemies' SPD (does not stack)
desc.jp: 用意周到：味方全員の追撃時に与えるHPダメージが上昇し 敵全体の素早さが減少する（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

desc.gl:
4-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Self: 6 turns Selkie Soul, ATK Up II
While Selkie Soul active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+
 • BRV Attack becomes Selkie Chase (BRV) (reduces target's BRV to 0 if not afflicted with Break; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement) during chain attacks
 • HP Attack becomes Selkie Chase (HP) (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; HP attack; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement) during chain attacks

通常「HP攻撃」が「HP攻撃＋」に変化し

ブレイク中でない対象のBRVを0にし
味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
対象に6ACTION「弱体の仕込み」付与

name.jp: セルキースローエクステンド

desc.en:
「Selkie Throw」 use +2

When using 「Selkie Throw」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
- Extends duration of 「Selkie Spirit」 by 3 turns
- Grants 「Medium Attack Up」 for 6 turns

While 「Selkie Spirit」 is active:
-「BRV Attack」 becomes 「BRV Attack +」:
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
-「HP Attack」 becomes 「HP Attack +」:
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV before attacking
　∟ Ranged BRV Attack + HP Attack
- During Chase, 「BRV Attack」 becomes 「Selkie Chase (BRV)」:
　∟ If target is not broken, reduce BRV to 0
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
　∟ Inflicts 「Weakness Preparation」 for 6 turns
- During Chase, 「HP Attack」 becomes 「Selkie Chase (HP)」:
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV before HP attacking
　∟ Inflicts 「Weakness Preparation」 for 6 turns

「Weakness Preparation」 lowers Defense and Speed
desc.gl:
Selkie Throw use +2

When using Selkie Throw:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Selkie Soul duration +3
 • Self: 6 turns ATK Up II

While Selkie Soul active: 
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; greatly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before attack; ranged BRV attack + HP attack)
 • BRV Attack becomes Selkie Chase (BRV) (reduces target's BRV to 0 if not afflicted with Break; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement) during chain attacks
 • HP Attack becomes Selkie Chase (HP) (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; HP attack; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement) during chain attacks
desc.jp:
「セルキースロー」の使用回数＋2

「セルキースロー」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・「セルキー魂」の3ACTION期間延長
・自身に6ACTION「攻撃力中アップ」付与

「セルキー魂」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」が「BRV攻撃＋」に変化し
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　合計BRV威力も大アップ
　-味方全員に自身の最大BRVに
　　依存した量のBRVを加算
・通常「HP攻撃」が「HP攻撃＋」に変化し
　-攻撃前に
　　味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
　-遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
・追撃時の「BRV攻撃」が
　「セルキーチェイス（BRV）」に変化し
　-ブレイク中でない対象のBRVを0にし
　　味方全員に自身の最大BRVに
　　依存した量のBRVを加算
　-対象に6ACTION「弱体の仕込み」付与
・追撃時の「HP攻撃」が
　「セルキーチェイス（HP）」に変化し
　-味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
　　＋HP攻撃に変化
　-対象に6ACTION「弱体の仕込み」付与

name.en: Sky High BRV+HP Hit Plus Force Advance++
name.gl: Sky High BRV HP Hit Plus Force Advance++
name.jp: スカイハイBRVHPヒットプラスフォースアドバンス＋＋

desc.en:
When using 「Sky High」:
- Becomes 6-HIT AoE ranged BRV + HP attack executed twice
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Moderately raises Max BRV overflow limit of stolen BRV

While both 「Selkie Spirit」 and 「Meticulous Preparation」 are active:
- 「BRV Attack」, 「BRV Attack+」 become 「BRV Attack++」:
　∟ Increases number of BRV Hits to 3
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency compared to 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ Raises ally BRV based on Max BRV
-「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」 become 「HP Attack++」:
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV before attacking
　∟ 2-HIT ranged BRV + HP Attack
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency compared to 「HP Attack+」
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- During Chase, 「BRV Attack」, 「Selkie Chase (BRV)」 become 「Selkie Chase+ (BRV)」:
　∟ If target is not broken, reduce BRV to 0
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
　∟ Inflicts 「Weakness Preparation」 for 6 turns
- During Chase, 「HP Attack」, 「Selkie Chase (HP)」 become 「Selkie Chase+ (HP)」:
　∟ Raises party BRV based on party Max BRV before HP attacking
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Inflicts 「Weakness Preparation」 for 6 turns
desc.gl:
When using Sky High:
 • 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV
 
While Selkie Soul, At the Ready active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before attack; becomes 2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost over HP Attack+; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
 • Chain-attack BRV Attack, Selkie Chase (BRV) becomes Selkie Chase+ (BRV) (reduces BRV of targets not afflicted with Break to 0; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement)
 • Chain-attack HP Attack, Selkie Chase (HP) becomes Selkie Chase+ (HP) (grants party BRV based on individual MAX BRV; HP attack; increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 120%; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement)
desc.jp:
「スカイハイ」使用時
・6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃
　＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限中アップ

「セルキー魂」「用意周到」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化し
　　「BRV攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も小アップ
　-味方全員に自身の最大BRVに
　　依存した量のBRVを加算
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-攻撃前に味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
　-2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化し
　　「HP攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も中アップ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・追撃時の「BRV攻撃」「セルキーチェイス（BRV）」が
　「セルキーチェイス＋（BRV）」に変化し
　-ブレイク中でない対象のBRVを0にし
　　味方全員に自身の最大BRVに
　　依存した量のBRVを加算
　-対象に6ACTION「弱体の仕込み」付与
・追撃時の「HP攻撃」「セルキーチェイス（HP）」が
　「セルキーチェイス＋（HP）」に変化し
　-味方全員にそれぞれの最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
　　＋HP攻撃に変化
　-加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
　-対象に6ACTION「弱体の仕込み」付与
